response.overview: Many people enjoy the excitement of gambling - taking a risk for the chance of a big payoff. What would you be willing to risk to win a cool $10 million and be set for life? Would you bet your very life playing Russian roulette? We went to Las Vegas and made that offer, and some people said yes! However, there is something at stake that is even greater. See if you are already taking the greatest gamble.
response.title: The Greatest Gamble
